testing.test_user_id: Create a test user via frontend signup
testing.test_child_id: Add a test child via frontend
testing.test_toy_id: Add a test toy via frontend
instructions: 1. Go to your frontend app and sign up/login
2. Add a child profile - note the child ID from Firestore
3. Add a toy - note the toy ID from Firestore
4. Update simulator configuration with these IDs
5. Ensure backend has service account key for this project

service_account.note: Download service account key from Firebase Console
service_account.path: Project Settings → Service Accounts → Generate New Private Key
